name: Nuclear Routine
description:
Nuclear Routine

Description 📖

You will operate unstable nuclear station.

Control water, heat, steam and power level to successfully pass first day on job.

HOW TO PLAY 🎮

  • Rotate valve to fill water tank. Water will cool reactor and generate steam.
  • Move cooling rods down to decrease and up to increase reactor temperature.
  • Keep temperature and water level high to generate steam. Steam is used to produce power.
  • Try to keep the power level more than zero

If Temperature or Steam level will be maximum for 10 seconds reactor will explode.

Also if power level will be 0 for 10 seconds you will lose too.

Credits
